successes.title: Traveller 5th Edition
successes.description: Traveller5 is the ultimate edition of the Traveller science-fiction role-playing game: rules and concepts you never thought possible.

Pledges.description: You show your support for this project, and it makes you eligible to order some of the Swag listed below (perhaps all you really want is one of the Options: the Traveller Dice set). You can always increase your pledge later.

You show your support for this project, and at the same time feel constrained by lack of resources, either because you are unemployed or under employed, or otherwise challenged. You believe in the statement: “Games get me through times of no money better than money gets me through times of no games.” You go on record supporting this Traveller5 Kickstarter project, for which we thank you. We’ll work something out. Your pledge of exactly $2 identifies you as in this category.
Your support helps to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. You receive a link to download the iconic Jesse Degraff Floating Scout Screen Saver (We call this Swag Bronze).

Your support is recognized with your name on the Galaxiad Wall Of Heroes. Your name is laser-carved on the alabaster cliffs overlooking the Sea of Mists on Ecalpemos (Pliabriebl 0411) after the crucial Battle of Shadows against the Black Fleets. Once the cliffs have been carved, you'll get a link. We call this Swag Silver; you will also get Swag Bronze.

Your support contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. You will receive Two Black Traveller Dice (we call this Swag Gold) as well as Swag Silver and Bronze. We can ship (just this) in a Padded Envelope (and we will ship it anywhere).

Your support contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. We'll call this Swag Gold-198. It includes the Traveller5 CDROM, plus Swags Gold, Silver and Bronze. We can ship (just this) in a Padded Envelope (and we will ship it anywhere).
Indeed, everyone getting Swag Gold gets this; it just won't let us enter it on the previous level. You do have to pay the extra dollar. If you pledged previously, you'll need to revise your pledge.

Your support actively contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. 
You will receive the Hardcover 600-page Traveller5 Core Rule Book. 
Plus Swag Gold, Silver, and Bronze. 
We ship this in a well-packed Priority Mail Medium Box to a US address. There is room to add an option or two as well.
If you are in Canada, you will need to increase your pledge by $25; 
if you are elsewhere in the world, you will need to increase your pledge by $40.

Imperial Space Noble Edition. 
Your support actively contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. 
You will receive the Hardcover 600-page Traveller5 Core Rule Book “Imperial Space” Edition.
This book includes a Credit-Card-size Land Grant and Patent of Nobility for a world within Imperial Space. Each is unique, embossed with the sector, world name, UWP, and Noble Rank on the strikingly beautiful black and red card. 
Randomly awarded as Baron, Marquis, Viscount, or Count. 
Plus Swag Gold, Silver, and Bronze. 
We ship this in a well-packed Priority Mail Medium Box to a US address. There is room to add an option or two as well.
If you are in Canada, you will need to increase your pledge by $25; 
if you are elsewhere in the world, you will need to increase your pledge by $40.

This pledge level is specifically for your FLSG. Five copies of the Traveller5 Core Rules Hardback, accompanied by a certificate of Nobility appointing the bearer a Knight of the Imperium. Retail $75 each. Distribution channels will not have this add-on.
Five Traveller Dice sets. Retail $15 each.
A Barony for the Store Owner: including the personal card-size certificate, and an 8-1/2 x 11 suitable-for-framing Certificate proclaiming the Owner a Baron of the Imperium.
$450 retail value. Shipped to a store in the USA.
To ensure this goes to a true FLGS, you must be a member of the CFFRM Crowd Funding Friendly Retailer Mailing List (email info at dlair.net). If you are not a member, you should join.

Spinward Marches Noble Edition.
Your support actively contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. 
You will receive the Hardcover 600-page Traveller5 Core Rule Book Spinward Marches Edition.
This book includes a Credit-Card-size Land Grant and Patent of Nobility for a world in Imperial Space in the Spinward Marches. 
Each is unique, embossed with the sector, world name, UWP, and Noble Rank on the strikingly beautiful black and red card. 
Randomly Awarded Baronet, Baron, Marquis, Viscount, or Count from the Spinward Marches. 
Plus Swag Gold, Silver, and Bronze. 
We ship this in a well-packed Priority Mail Medium Box to a US address. There is room to add an option or two as well.
If you are in Canada, you will need to increase your pledge by $25; 
if you are elsewhere in the world, you will need to increase your pledge by $40.

Imperial Space Duke Edition.
Your support actively contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. 
You will receive the Hardcover 600-page Traveller5 Core Rule Book “Imperial Space” Edition.
This book includes a Credit-Card-size Land Grant and Patent of Nobility for a world within Imperial Space. Each is unique, embossed with the sector, world name, UWP, and Noble Rank on the strikingly beautiful black and red card. 
Randomly awarded as Duke. 
Packaged in a handsome Slipcase.
Plus Swag Gold, Silver, and Bronze. 
We ship this in a well-packed Priority Mail Medium Box to a US address. There is room to add an option or two as well.
If you are in Canada, you will need to increase your pledge by $25; 
if you are elsewhere in the world, you will need to increase your pledge by $40.

Spinward Marches Duke Edition.
Your support actively contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. 
You will receive the Hardcover 600-page Traveller5 Core Rule Book “Spinward Marches” Edition.
This book includes a Credit-Card-size Land Grant and Patent of Nobility for a world within Imperial Space. Each is unique, embossed with the sector, world name, UWP, and Noble Rank on the strikingly beautiful black and red card. 
Randomly awarded as Duke. 
Packaged in a handsome Slipcase.
Plus Swag Gold, Silver, and Bronze. 
We ship this in a well-packed Priority Mail Medium Box to a US address. There is room to add an option or two as well.
If you are in Canada, you will need to increase your pledge by $25; 
if you are elsewhere in the world, you will need to increase your pledge by $40.

Personalized Imperial Space Edition.
Your support actively contributes to our efforts to make Traveller5 the best edition ever. 
You will receive the Hardcover 600-page Traveller5 Core Rule Book “Imperial Space” Edition.
